Name: Bowtie2
Description: Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences.

Name: bwa
Description: BWA is a software package for mapping low-divergent sequences against a large reference genome, such as the human genome.

Name: Gsnap
Description: GSNAP is a genomic short-read nucleotide alignment program.

Name: Hisat2
Description: HISAT2 is a fast and sensitive alignment program for mapping NGS reads (both DNA and RNA) to reference genomes.

Name: Rsubread
Description: Rsubread is a Bioconductor software package that provides high-performance alignment and read counting functions for RNA-seq reads.

Name: STAR
Description: STAR is an ultrafast universal RNA-seq aligner.

Name: Tophat2
Description: TopHat is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads.

Name: Bismark
Description: Bismark is a program to map bisulfite treated sequencing reads to a genome of interest and perform methylation calls in a single step.

Name: Trinity
Description: Trinity assembles transcript sequences from Illumina RNA-Seq data.

Name: TransDecoder
Description: TransDecoder identifies candidate coding regions within transcript sequences.

Name: Picard
Description: Picard is a set of command line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data and formats such as SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF.

Name: Blast
Description: BLAST finds regions of similarity between biological sequences.

Name: MACS2
Description: MACS2 identifies transcription factor binding sites in ChIP-seq data.

Name: Samtools
Description: Samtools is a suite of programs for interacting with high-throughput sequencing data.

Name: Busco
Description: BUSCO assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking Universal Single-Copy Orthologs.

Name: Fastqc
Description: FastQC is a quality control tool for high throughput sequence data.

Name: TransRate
Description: Transrate is software for de-novo transcriptome assembly quality analysis.

Name: Kallisto
Description: kallisto is a program for quantifying abundances of transcripts from RNA-Seq data.

Name: FASTX-Toolkit
Description: FASTX-Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing.

Name: Trim_galore
Description: Trim Galore is a wrapper around Cutadapt and FastQC to consistently apply adapter and quality trimming to FastQ files.

Name: Trimmomatic
Description: Trimmomatic is a flexible read trimming tool for Illumina NGS data.

Name: Trinotate
Description: Trinotate is a comprehensive annotation suite designed for automatic functional annotation of transcriptomes.

Name: BCFtools
Description: BCFtools is a program for variant calling and manipulating files in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart BCF.

Name: GATK
Description: Variant Discovery in High-Throughput Sequencing Data.
